title: Carder, 19th century
signed: Maker's stamp on back of carder now indecipherable.
description: Wool carder made of wood with wooden handle - one side of carder is covered with leather in which are set many wire pins arranged in vertical rows in order to straighten woolen fibres.

tombstone.epitaph:
Carder, 19th century.
19th century. Wood, leather and steel wire. Gift of Fanny L. Johnson. 1918-23-4-b.
